title: A Little Spark
description: Sparks fly when sassy firefighter Jilli meets her match in Amy K. McClungâ€™s enemies-to-lovers romance.When Sam and Jillian meet, the snark and sparks start to fly. Despite their intense attraction, words and actions are misunderstood, and miscommunication is rife. Will their stubbornness be their downfall or the start of something extraordinary?
author: Amy K. McClung
